techmeme.title: Sources: Chinese social e-commerce app Xiaohongshu had $200M in net profit on $1B+ revenue in Q1 2024, up from $40M in net profit on ~$600M revenue in Q1 2023 (Eleanor Olcott/Financial Times)
Q&A with physicist Lenka Zdeborová on how the physics of phase transitions in matter can help model the behavior of algorithms, understanding LLMs, and more (John Pavlus/Quanta Magazine)
Matt Mullenweg says WordPress is "forking" Advanced Custom Fields, a plugin developed by WP Engine; ACF team says the plugin was taken away "without consent" (Anthony Ha/TechCrunch)
Some Ukrainian soldiers say SpaceX has not done enough to crack down on illicit use of Starlink terminals by Russia to power its advance in Ukraine (Washington Post)
Apple adds an option in iOS 18.1 to let users set a "Primary" email address in Settings, letting users change the email associated with their Apple Account (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
